command.name: help:commands
command.help: View a list of available artisan commands.

command.name: key:generate
command.help: Generate a secure application key. An application key will not be generated unless the field in config/application.php is empty.

command.name: migrate
command.help: Running outstanding migrations. --type application: Running outstanding migrations in the application --type bundle: Running outstanding migrations in a bundle

command.name: migrate:rollback
command.help: Rolling back the last migration operation.

command.name: migrate:reset
command.help: Rolling back the last migration operation.

command.name: bundle:upgrade
command.help: Upgrade a bundle or all bundles

command.name: bundle:publish
command.help: Publish a bundle assets or all bundle assets

command.name: test
command.help: Running the application tests or bundle test
